com.example.colibris.calib.sound

Class MeasurementsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.colibris.calib.sound.MeasurementsHelper

  • public class MeasurementsHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The MeasurementsHelper permits to get sound related measurements In particular, it permets to obtain the sound level over a period of time that can be parametrized
